parameters.name: emailRecipient
parameters.description: Recipient email of the export (override default user email)

requestBody.description: The necessary contents to create an export

interval.description: The interval of data (Accepted value : 31 days for 1h interval, 1 year for 1d interval, 5y for 1w interval)

patched.description: Wether you want to get only original data or eventually patched ones to avoid holes.

404.description: The invitation does not exist or is not pending

post.summary: Get a cloudinary signature to make a signed upload

404.description: Organisation does not exists or don't have preferences

put.summary: Allow an organisation to join an open network

get.summary: Create a chargebee hosted page for quote

tags.name: system
tags.description: System endpoints, to be use by Sencrop's teams only.

tags.name: modules
tags.description: Endpoint related to the Sencrop's modules.

tags.name: data
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to access to devices's data.

tags.name: graphql
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to execute GraphQL queries.

tags.name: search
tags.description: Endpoints allowing to discover entities through the API.

tags.name: oauth2
tags.description: Endpoints relative to the [OAuth2](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749) implementation at Sencrop (still a work in progress).

tags.name: quotes
tags.description: Endpoints related to quote and quotator.

tags.name: shares
tags.description: Endpoints related to organisations shared devices.

tags.name: buckets
tags.description: Endpoints related to buckets (management of device remplacement).

tags.name: invitations
tags.description: Endpoints related to invitations (invite users with extra side effects).

tags.name: preferences
tags.description: Endpoints related to preferences of the application.

tags.name: orders
tags.description: Endpoints related to manual and chargebee orders.

tags.name: monitoring
tags.description: Endpoints related to monitoring of factory/devices activities.
